title: Network Analysis of Cyberbullying Interactions on Instagram
summary: Cyberbullying continues to grow in prevalence and its impact is felt by thousands worldwide. This study seeks a network science perspective on cyberbullying interaction patterns on the popular photo and video-sharing platform, Instagram. Using an annotated cyberbullying dataset containing over 400 Instagram posts, we outline a set of heuristics for building Session Graphs, where nodes represent us
